sense.name: calculate,reckon
sense.commentary: NP1[agent] FORECAST NP2 Note: Implies a probable event based on data, not something inevitable.
sense.examples: The hurricane was forecast to hit Florida by nightfall. The government is forecasting an economic upturn, based on these data.

sense.name: indicate,portend
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1[topic] FORECAST NP2 Note: Suggests the event is inevitable, predestined to occur.
sense.examples: The cards forecast death to Carmen in the second act of the opera. Pre-election polls in El Salvador consistently forecasted a Handal defeat. Price increases forecast inflation.
